description:
The next round of the tournament is upon Team Hokage, but Domon and Fuko have fallen into Kurei`s trap! Rather than lose by default, a certain someone shows up to save the day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beastly Roar: The Warrior from Hell!!
Shishi no Otakebi Jigoku no Senshi!!
獣の雄叫び 地獄の戦士!!
